sect2.para: Acts as a multiplexer or demultiplexer for multiple signal paths. Connect the sink at input index to the source at output index. Leave all other ports disconnected.

sect3.para: Specifies the data type of the input and output streams.

row.entry: Input and output streams are complex.
Input and output streams are real.
Input and output streams are 32-bit integer.
Input and output streams are 16-bit integer.
Input and output streams are 8-bit byte.

sect3.para: Specifies the number of inputs. Inputs will be labelled in0 through in(N-1).
Specifies the number of outputs. Outputs will be labelled out0 through out(N-1).
Specifies the selected input. The value must be between 0 and (Num Inputs - 1).
Specifies the selected output. The value must be between 0 and (Num Outputs - 1).
Specifies the vector length for vector processing. Typical applications will use the default value of 1.
